body:
i'm thankful that there's only one more morning of waking up alone, since d's work retreat will be over soon. i'm thankful she had a really difficult day yesterday and i'm thankful to be proud of how she handled herself, as i always am. i'm thankful to get to go to the dinner at the boss's house tonight, even though i feel slightly apprehensive to see my old coworkers, most of whom i haven't talked to since i quit and a few of whom i just ghosted on. i'm thankful that this apprehension is outweighed by my affection for my old coworkers (most of them at least) and moreover by the fact that i will get to spend time with my favorite dog in town who d and i sat for in the winter (not the golden retriever we sat for more recently, who i am not thankful for). i'm thankful to imagine throwing a stick for him to catch and return to me and getting to pet him a lot.

i'm thankful for pitchfork's best album lists and for [this piece about them](http://www.thestranger.com/slog/2017/08/22/25367812/the-problem-with-pitchforks-200-best-albums-of-the-oh-jesus-christ-shut-the-fuck-up-and-read-it-already). i'm thankful that last night i wanted to play music on the good speakers in the living room but couldn't get the chromecast working so i sat on the floor directly in front of them with my laptop plugged into the aux cord. i'm thankful that though this was inconvenient, it also made me feel like i was inside the music in a way i don't get when i sit farther away. 

i'm thankful for [this excellent favorite songs 2017](https://open.spotify.com/user/danceremix/playlist/6ZnsyzL4tQ8w2KPh31QKDc) playlist by sam donsky, which iintroduced me to/reminded me of a bunch of really wonderful songs. i'm thankful for the gentle pump of "[fior di latte](https://open.spotify.com/track/1oJy4Imge6M4SoJlHwMWP7)" by phoenix. i'm thankful for the stately piano loop on "[flood watch](https://open.spotify.com/track/1oJy4Imge6M4SoJlHwMWP7)." i'm thankful for the extraordinary machinery of "[issues](https://open.spotify.com/track/0xG0SHshCStMEyNbNC5d4k)" by julia michaels. i'm thankful for "[just can't get enough](https://open.spotify.com/track/2dK4Rxfsj7u9ax6rbYGf8s)", which is like finding a really cool jacket on sale at a vintage store. i'm thankful for the sweetness of amber coffman's voice on "[no coffee](https://open.spotify.com/track/1fNSjDh98pwR0HAkvIcDj3)." i'm thankful for "[astral plane](https://open.spotify.com/track/1ISGSSgVnZhyiOGSI8itNa)" by valerie june, which makes me want more country produced like shoegaze. i'm thankful for "[no. 28](https://open.spotify.com/track/0o1yupLwR1vjnEWbLPQqrO)" by methyl ethyl, which makes me feel like rory watching the shins in that one episode of _gilmore girls_.

i'm thankful for [this perfect telegram from dorothy parker](https://twitter.com/yashar/status/900043221149118466). i'm thankful for [this carpool karaoke with maisie williams and sophie turner](https://twitter.com/CarpoolKaraoke/status/900039887868411904) (i'm especially thankful that james corden is nowhere to be seen). i'm thankful for [this bot of decontextualized QVC screenshots](https://twitter.com/QVCbot/status/899946058570014721), which i find oddly soothing. i'm thankful for our new trash pickup service and for the enormous trashcan we now have. i'm thankful [to try to touch the screen](https://twitter.com/archillect/status/900117910093541378).
normalized_markdown:
i'm thankful that there's only one more morning of waking up alone, since d's work retreat will be over soon. i'm thankful she had a really difficult day yesterday and i'm thankful to be proud of how she handled herself, as i always am. i'm thankful to get to go to the dinner at the boss's house tonight, even though i feel slightly apprehensive to see my old coworkers, most of whom i haven't talked to since i quit and a few of whom i just ghosted on. i'm thankful that this apprehension is outweighed by my affection for my old coworkers (most of them at least) and moreover by the fact that i will get to spend time with my favorite dog in town who d and i sat for in the winter (not the golden retriever we sat for more recently, who i am not thankful for). i'm thankful to imagine throwing a stick for him to catch and return to me and getting to pet him a lot.

i'm thankful for pitchfork's best album lists and for [this piece about them](http://www.thestranger.com/slog/2017/08/22/25367812/the-problem-with-pitchforks-200-best-albums-of-the-oh-jesus-christ-shut-the-fuck-up-and-read-it-already). i'm thankful that last night i wanted to play music on the good speakers in the living room but couldn't get the chromecast working so i sat on the floor directly in front of them with my laptop plugged into the aux cord. i'm thankful that though this was inconvenient, it also made me feel like i was inside the music in a way i don't get when i sit farther away. 

i'm thankful for [this excellent favorite songs 2017](https://open.spotify.com/user/danceremix/playlist/6ZnsyzL4tQ8w2KPh31QKDc) playlist by sam donsky, which iintroduced me to/reminded me of a bunch of really wonderful songs. i'm thankful for the gentle pump of "[fior di latte](https://open.spotify.com/track/1oJy4Imge6M4SoJlHwMWP7)" by phoenix. i'm thankful for the stately piano loop on "[flood watch](https://open.spotify.com/track/1oJy4Imge6M4SoJlHwMWP7)." i'm thankful for the extraordinary machinery of "[issues](https://open.spotify.com/track/0xG0SHshCStMEyNbNC5d4k)" by julia michaels. i'm thankful for "[just can't get enough](https://open.spotify.com/track/2dK4Rxfsj7u9ax6rbYGf8s)", which is like finding a really cool jacket on sale at a vintage store. i'm thankful for the sweetness of amber coffman's voice on "[no coffee](https://open.spotify.com/track/1fNSjDh98pwR0HAkvIcDj3)." i'm thankful for "[astral plane](https://open.spotify.com/track/1ISGSSgVnZhyiOGSI8itNa)" by valerie june, which makes me want more country produced like shoegaze. i'm thankful for "[no. 28](https://open.spotify.com/track/0o1yupLwR1vjnEWbLPQqrO)" by methyl ethyl, which makes me feel like rory watching the shins in that one episode of _gilmore girls_.

i'm thankful for [this perfect telegram from dorothy parker](https://twitter.com/yashar/status/900043221149118466). i'm thankful for [this carpool karaoke with maisie williams and sophie turner](https://twitter.com/CarpoolKaraoke/status/900039887868411904) (i'm especially thankful that james corden is nowhere to be seen). i'm thankful for [this bot of decontextualized QVC screenshots](https://twitter.com/QVCbot/status/899946058570014721), which i find oddly soothing. i'm thankful for our new trash pickup service and for the enormous trashcan we now have. i'm thankful [to try to touch the screen](https://twitter.com/archillect/status/900117910093541378).
